name: 蔣勇南
objective: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
schedule:
WEEK	TOPIC	WEEK	TOPIC
1	Orientation	10	Interpreting idioms
2	Intro: History & Practice	11	Memory training
3	Active Listening	12	Memory training
4	Active Listeing/ST	13	Interpretting numbers
5	ST	         14       Note-taking
6	Public speaking	15	Note-taking
7	Paraphrasing	16	Short and Longer CI 
8	Paraphrasing	17	Short and Longer CI
9	MID-TERM EXAM	18	Final Exam
scorePolicy: 1 Mid-term exam 30 %; 2 Final exam 30 %; 3 Quizzes 20 %; 4 Participation& homework 20%.
